Hi All,

I am working on hertrix and would like to know optimal configurati=
on.
Following are my queries. Can anyone help me?

1. How to run job from c=
ommandline?

2. Is heritrix support POST method?

3. Can we configure it to=
 run minimum number of threads even if the

w heritrix respects politeness when
multiple threads run?

er be restricted to pull links from identified page.
For eg. Job site may s=
how job listings and each job page may have
